title:
Komik
              A Story About a Boy Who Crossdresses Every Day for the Sake of His Favourite Female Teacher.
alternative_titles: 好きな女教師のために××する男子生徒の話, The Boy Who Crossdresses to Talk to the Teacher He Likes
author: Kurotama
synopsis:
Manga                    A Story About a Boy Who Crossdresses Every Day for the Sake of His Favourite Female Teacher. yang dibuat oleh komikus bernama
                    Kurotama ini bercerita tentang
                    Pria paling baik saat mengenakan pakaian wanita.

chapters.title: Komik A Story About a Boy Who Crossdresses Every Day for the Sake of His Favourite Female Teacher. Chapter 00
